summary: A teenager copes with his sexuality on the last day of school in 1984. It shows him coping with being gay and being with friends.
cast: Chris Stafford|Tina Holmes|Andersen Gabrych|Stephanie McVay|Lea DeLaria|John Eby|Antonio Carriero|Jason Lockhart|Tony Maietta|Jeff Fryer|Kevin Joseph Kelly|Mark Gates|Stevie Reese Desmond|Barbie Marie|Craig H. Nichols|Jay Warshak|Diva Delaria-Foley|Jesse Adams|Carolyn Baeumler|April Foiles|Xan Garcia|Sara Hammerman|Samantha Haspel|Carl Hodson|Michael Medeco|Regan Urbanick|Joshua Elrod|Lisa L. Wiley
title: Edge of Seventeen
